attributes.title: PARAMASHIVA'S GURU POORNIMA MESSAGE || 23 JULY 2021
attributes.description:
23 JULY 2021, FRIDAY (IST) - ENGLISH AND TAMIL NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST
05:32 AM - THE SPH DARSHAN
SHAKTI PADA AND SHAKTINI PADA WITH THE LIVE DARSHAN OF THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAWAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM.  
GURU PURNIMA AND 10TH DAY OF THE GURU PURNIMA BRAHMOTSAVAM 
09:40 AM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG 
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA ON THIS AUSPICIOUS GURU PURNIMA DAY:
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY FOR ALL BEINGS NOT JUST HUMAN BEINGS, IS THE PURPOSE OF ALL THE BEINGS AND THAT IS THE PURPOSE OF PARAMASHIVA’S MANIFESTATION AS GURU, LINGA AND SANGHA - KAILASA..
*PARAMASHIVA MANIFESTS AS GURU - INCARNATION, NIJA AVATARA, AS LINGA - ARCHA AVATARA AND SANGHA  - KAILASA, FOR MAKING EVERY BEING EXPERIENCE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*EXPERIENCING CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE PURPOSE OF YOUR EXISTENCE; MAKING YOU EXPERIENCE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE PURPOSE OF MY EXISTENCE.
*A PERSON WHO REALISES HIS CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY WILL BE AN AMAZING BEING RADIATING ALL THE BEST THINGS OF LIFE - HEALTH, WEALTH, A BEAUTIFUL INTERPERSONAL RELATIONSHIP NOT JUST WITH FAMILY AND TEAM BUT WITH THE WHOLE NATION, WHOLE PLANET AND WHOLE EXISTENCE HE LIVES WITH 
*WHOLE HINDUISM  - ALL TRADITIONS, SAMPRADAYAS, ORDERS, SECTS, AND SUBSECTS  - IS FOCUSSED ON MAKING EVERY BEING REALISE CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*THE WHOLE PURPOSE IS YOU REALISING CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY.
*CONSCIOUS SOVEREIGNTY IS THE ULTIMATE WAY OF EXISTING. 
READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/365461868279984
